name: Cat Simulator 3D - Animal Life
description:
If you do not have a real cat in the house but you do want to get a pet to take care of it, if you like games with animals even if they are virtual then our application “Cat Simulator” is a great option for your leisure time. Download our app for free on your smartphone or tablet and live an exciting life with your cat.

Characteristics of the application “Cat Simulator”

You can make friends with an online cat just downloading our program on your phone or tablet for free. Live and play like a real cat, acquire a family for your pet and learn something new about your favorite breed of cats every day in this simulator.

Our adventure 3D game allows you to choose a domestic animal of a desired breed, to play with friends and their cute pets online in real time thanks to the multiplayer mode, to be friends with them, to create real clans and even to protect your family. The higher level is your cat and its family, the more breeds will be opened for you.

Advantages of the Cat Simulator application

There are such advantages in our Cat Simulator that you can appreciate:

1. The ability to create a cat as well as the whole cat family. Choose a nickname, the gender, a desired color, clothes and accessories. Grow the beast and care for it. Find a mate and kittens for your pet. Gain rewards and earn coins that you can use for unlocking new breeds.

2. The events of the game take place in an exciting world where you can complete various tasks, adventures, battles with enemies and a lot more. In this simulator the game for sure won’t be boring because you will find enjoyment in leveling up your kitten, communicating with cats of other breeds as well as fighting with enemies and discovering new combat achievements.

3. Our Cat Simulation game supports 3D expansion. Discover unusual places and locations, nature and big cities, feel all the weather conditions and seasons. We did everything to make you feel yourself in a real world.

4. The ability to play with friends online in online simulators. Bored of playing alone? Then turn on a multiplayer mode when you have an Internet connection, invite your friends and play together, complete various tasks, fight with beasts enemies and protect your families.

All your personal and collective results will be accurately calculated and put into the leaderboard. Keep count of your points and hold the top spot the leaderboard.

Try to download our application for free right now and feel all the advantages that animal simulators online can offer you in 2019!
